name: Charles Honaker
text:
Amazing!!!!  We just moved to the area.  I was pleasantly surprised at how good the pizza was.  We ordered a thin crust with multiple toppings.  It was cooked to perfection and some on time.
I will be going back.

name: Bobby Smith
text: Pizza was good, prices were good, and the service was great. We were done in customers. The place was very clean and well kept.

name: itsjust sabrina
text: Well I gave it 5 stars cause finally yesterday my curly fries where actually done. They've not been getting all the way done. But yes this is a great place to eat. I love it.

name: Jo Arreaga
text: I had the Submarine hoagie, husband Italian Steak hoagie and son had a thick crust pepperoni cheese pizza...very good

name: Heather Davis
text: Really good pizza, and amazing service. We got to the restaurant when it first opened and was asked what type of pizzas we would like on the buffet. The dessert pizza was amazing. Great and friendly service

name: Terry Massey
text: Very friendly staff and the food is always very good.

name: mk17norge
text: Southern charm at it's finest! Hearty portions and great variety with a very attentive and friendly server. The atmosphere was very family friendly and walked out of there with some unique souvenirs.  Definitely would recommend going there instead of a chain place.

name: Christopher Cannady
text: Very nice people and great Pizza definitely will be back

name: steve rawls
text: Good pizza, friendly staff and good service

name: Judy Walter
text: I have had LOTS of pizza and I love the taste of their pizza. Not garlicky, flavorful and lots of topping choices. Thick or thin crust. They also have subs and soft ice cream!

name: John Utter
text: Nice little no frills spot!

name: shaun patterson
text: Great place to eat and I enjoy there subs and salad bar very much. Only complaint is there terrible manager. The bald headed guy with glasses named Michael is a real tool.

name: stephanie g
text: Took over 2 hours to get my order delivered and the food was lukewarm. Was very disappointed in the quality of the pizza too. I would suggest considering another option before trying this one. All around disappointing experience.

name: Colt Fink
text: Sat in line for 40 minutes and half of that was me with my pizza because they hadn't made my salads it does not take 20 minutes to make 2 salads in 2 plastic containers I ended up having cold pizza plus they forgot my half gallon of tea

name: Jerry Suiter
text: Pizza is my little girls favorite food an place is very kid friendly an great southern hospitality

text: Huge banner out front stated $7.99 buffet, but at checkout I was advised there has been a price increase and charged $8.99. Buffet only had 3 pizzas available.

name: Sandra Jackson
text: I love Pizza Plus at Baileyton , Tn.   Their staff is Always very Hospitable.  And, they supply Buffet with Peoples favorites , fairly fast .  Usually a great Dining experience.

name: Zoreen P
text: I was traveling and stop here. You serve yourself here. They make different pizzas and put them under a heating lamp in like a buffet style. I went during the evening and the pizza was dry and tasted terrible. The slices are small. I was ‚Ä¶More
